name: Slots: Realm of Magic
description:
Welcome to Slots: Realm of Magic - absolutely brand new video slots for your iPhone/iPad!
Great slot world with more then 40 unique slot machines, colorful HD graphics, and cool music transport you to an amazing Vegas atmosphere.

Just relax and play Slots: Realm of Magic.
The game is easy to play and brings tons of fun! Download it today for FREE!

- More than 40 slot machines
- Easy to play
- High Win Rate
- Lots of minigames
- FREE coins everyday and after every 4 hours!
- Autospin
- Great epic music and sounds effects
- Optimized for both iOS tablets and phones!

The game does not offer real money gambling or an opportunity to win real money or real prizes. This product is intended for use by those 21 or older for amusement purposes only. Practice or success at social casino gaming does not imply future success at real money gambling.
